data.content: Mục đichs của Thông báo kế hoạch nghiệm thu cho bài toán AI

The purpose of the "Thông báo kế hoạch nghiệm thu cho bài toán AI" (Notification of the acceptance plan for AI problems) is to inform the departments about the milestones for acceptance testing and feature deployment. This notification ensures that the departments are aware of the testing and deployment schedule for the AI problem.

Document: [Quy trinh.docx](./data/pdf/Quy trinh.pdf)
Page: 5
